content: One test subject in CRISPR therapy (RP-101) displayed mild immune response. Temporary steroid used.
metadata: Reported: 2025-02-22, severity: mild, no long-term effect

content: CAR-T infusion reaction in early trial subject (RP-102). Fever, controlled with supportive meds.
metadata: Date: 2025-03-05, site: OncoCell trial center, outcome: stable

content: Scaffolding polymer in rodent model (RP-103) caused localized inflammation in 2/30 animals. Resolved spontaneously.
mRNA vaccine test revealed injection-site redness in 3 volunteers. Lasted ~48 hours.
Engineered Lactobacillus (RP-105) caused GI discomfort in 1 participant. Possibly unrelated meal factor.
metadata: Date: 2025-03-03, overshadowed by poor diet diary record
